faqs.title: Frequently asked questions
faqs.subtitle: Still unsure? Reach out and we’ll walk you through it.

item-1.question: Do I need an account to use the help center?
item-1.answer: No. Articles, examples, and best practices are publicly accessible. Logged-in customers get extra project templates.

item-2.question: How often is the documentation updated?
item-2.answer: We update the library alongside every VibeTrans release cycle and whenever feedback highlights missing steps.

item-3.question: Where can I request new guides?
item-3.answer: Use the feedback form at the bottom of any article or email support@vibetrans.ai and our documentation team will triage your request.
